agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Health & Human Services TIME & DATE: 8:30 AM, Wednesday, March 27, 2019 PLACE: Senate Chamber CHAIR: Senator Lois Kolkhorst To consider the following: SCR 21 Kolkhorst Approving the settlement agreement between the State of Texas and the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, Office for Civil Rights. SB 1056 Zaffirini Relating to the authority of physicians to delegate to certain pharmacists the implementation and modification of a patient's drug therapy. SB 1636 Zaffirini Relating to an annual report prepared by the Health Professions Council. SB 2132 Powell Relating to the provision of information to certain women enrolled in the Healthy Texas Women program. SB 2200 Kolkhorst Relating to conforming amendments to ensure that health and human services agencies may continue to obtain criminal history record information. Pending Business Oral testimony: fill out a paper witness card and submit to the Clerk. Oral and written testimony: fill out a paper witness card and hold on to your documents until your name is called to the table. Position only: register using the Senate kiosk located in the extension hallways or by going to Http://swrs on public-capitol. Written testimony only: register your position using the Senate kiosk then bring your 20 copies, with your name on each copy, to the Assistant Clerk, during the hearing. Public oral testimony will be limited to 3 minutes ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
